definition: to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Stairs-shaped international meeting hall is decorated with light-gray carpet and softly-covered wall.
sentences.chinese: 階梯式國際會議廳配以淺灰色的地毯與軟包牆面。

sentences.english: All the seats inside the stadium for the soft bag chairs, comfortable and very human.
sentences.chinese: 賽場內座椅全部爲軟包座椅，非常舒適和人性化。

sentences.english: Certainly. Would you like toast, breakfast rolls, croissants or Diansh pastries?
sentences.chinese: 好的，您喜歡多士，早餐軟包，牛角包或者丹麥包？
